subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] From a manual tune session this morning [1 Attachment]
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Open air recording--set the recorder next to a speaker, then annouce you're
doing an EVP recording and start sweeping--slowly, you want to catch words,
but not too many complete phrases off individual stations.  The audio seems
to be manipulated between the speaker and the recorder.

 F-S
